trends: There have been no other sightings in monroe
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside lighting fireworks. I looked up at the sky as I often do because I like looking at the stars. I saw an object that looked like a star flying across the sky. It did kind of a wide turn then faded out and was gone. At the time i though it may be an airplane but I saw no blinking red lights. But then again airplanes don't just disappear do they?
